characteristics.name: Critical Thinking
characteristics.description: Consistently questions assumptions and challenges information to arrive at a well-reasoned conclusion.

options.description: Thoughtfully evaluates arguments with a critical eye.

characteristics.name: Analytical Mindset
characteristics.description: Demonstrates a talent for breaking down complex information into manageable components.

options.description: Sees the big picture and understands how individual pieces fit together.
Focuses intently on specific details to ensure accuracy.

characteristics.name: Knowledge Base
characteristics.description: Possesses a broad and in-depth understanding of various subjects, including history, technology, and marketing.

options.description: Acquires knowledge quickly through diverse sources.
Focuses on achieving expertise in specific areas.

characteristics.name: Social Dynamics
characteristics.description: Effectively navigates complex social situations and builds strong relationships with others.

options.description: Sincerely considers the perspectives of others.

characteristics.name: Media Literacy
characteristics.description: Recognizes bias and misinformation in various media formats.

options.description: Distinguishes fact from opinion with ease.
Approaches information with a healthy dose of skepticism.

characteristics.name: Creative Problem Solving
characteristics.description: Generates innovative solutions to complex problems.

options.description: Thinks outside conventional boundaries to find unique answers.
Prioritizes efficiency and feasibility in solving problems.

characteristics.name: Growth Mindset
characteristics.description: Embraces challenges as opportunities for growth and development.

options.description: Takes calculated risks to pursue ambitious goals.
Bounces back from setbacks with determination.

characteristics.name: Communication Style
characteristics.description: Effectively conveys thoughts and ideas through clear, concise language.
